segments.text: I feel a sense of disgust looking at this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is just disgusting, pouring all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in the puddle, completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over, which is just disgusting to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and no one seems to care about the mess it's making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, instead of helping her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just disgusting and frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone steps in and cleans up this mess before it gets any worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
